message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could greatly enhance your daily routine or professional tasks. Given its quality and functionality, I'm proposing a price of $100 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality and design of your product. However, given my current budget constraints, I am unable to accept $100. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $85. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In order to reach an agreement, I am willing to consider your proposal. Therefore, I am offering the product at a price of $90. I hope this revised price meets your requirements.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to counterpropose a price of $87. I hope this is within your consideration range.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. Considering your latest counteroffer, I am pleased to propose a price of $89 for the item. I believe this strikes a balance between our interests and I hope it works for you.

I appreciate your effort to meet my budget, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to counteroffer at $88. This price aligns more closely with what I am able to spend while still valuing the quality of your product.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. Considering your latest proposal, I am willing to agree on a price of $88 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
